app.controllers

Class UndoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controllers.UndoController

  • public class UndoController
extends java.lang.Object
    In charge of undos and redos. Implements undos and redos as two stacks of ArrayLists of TodoItems. Implemented as a singleton.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void clear()
      Clears both the undo and redo stack.
      protected void clearRedo()
      Clears the redo stack.
      protected static UndoController getUndoController()
      Getter for UndoController.
      boolean isRedoEmpty()
      Checks if redo stack is empty.
      boolean isUndoEmpty()
      Checks if undo stack is empty.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> loadRedo()
      Pops an ArrayList of TodoItems from the redo stack.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> loadUndo()
      Pops an ArrayList of TodoItems from the undo stack.
      protected void saveRedo(java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> list)
      Saves an ArrayList of TodoItems to the redo stack using deep cloning.
      protected void saveUndo(java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> list)
      Saves an ArrayList of TodoItems to the undo stack using deep cloning.
